entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Airdrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches east of the QE2 Highway. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches east of the QE2 Highway early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
